author: nagy
msg: Extended RequestResponseTransport to allow the transport to block after control is returned (e.g. if the message is paused) and then resume once a response is available.  This will enable RM to be used for IN-OUT MEPs over a request/response transport.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Fixed the REST client side binding to send the correct POST body length and retrieve response headers. On the server side, no need to close the connection anymore, connections can be kept alive across multiple interactions.

author: mperham
msg: Add site documentation describing the Perforce provider and how it works

author: ruchithf
msg: Only copy the RECV_RESULTS over if we don't already have them in the current message context
